abstract: Microsoft Chief Executive Steve Ballmer said on Thursday the company aims to pursue an independent path, focusing on up to 20 smaller acquisitions of $50 million to $1 billion each annually rather than mega-deals.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft Chief Executive Steve Ballmer said on Thursday the company aims to pursue an independent path, focusing on up to 20 smaller acquisitions of $50 million to $1 billion each annually rather than mega-deals.

abstract: Halo 3 sold 3.3 million copies in its first 12 days on the market, helping Microsoft’s Xbox 360 edge out the Nintendo Wii as the top-selling game console in September.
snippet: Halo 3 sold 3.3 million copies in its first 12 days on the market, helping Microsoft’s Xbox 360 edge out the Nintendo Wii as the top-selling game console in September.
